title: Apple just had a record-breaking iPhone quarter
full_text:
Apple just had a record-breaking iPhone quarter. Apple says the iPhone had its "best-ever" quarter, with revenue hitting more than $85.3 billion over the past few months. The company announced the news as part of its Q1 2026 earnings report, which also revealed record-breaking revenue of $143.8 billion, up ….
